translated: The good deeds are the deeds of body, speech, and mind, which are the deeds for the sake of beings by the body which is like pure gold, by the many words of the secret mantras, and by the mind which is the mandala of the inner mind.

original: gang phyir ngan song bdag cag sbyangs //
analyzed: gang phyir ngan song bdag cag sbyangs //
translated: Since you have purified us, the beings of the lower realms,

original: zhes @13b bya ba ni thabs dang shes rab zung du 'brel ba'i thugs rjes 'khor ba'i rgyu 'bras rkyen gsum sbyangs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes @13b bya ba ni thabs dang shes rab zung du 'brel ba'i thugs rjes 'khor ba'i rgyu 'bras rkyen gsum sbyangs pa'o //
translated: this is the purification of the three causes, effects, and conditions of cyclic existence by the compassion which is the union of means and insight.ğŸ”½Since you have established them in the very conduct of the Bodhisattvas,

original: byang chub spyod pa nyid la bzhag / ces bya ba ni sems can de rnams 'khor ba las bton nas byang chub tu sems bskyed de dga' ldan gyi gnas su skye bar bya ba'i phyir na bstod pa des bstod pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub spyod pa nyid la bzhag / ces bya ba ni sems can de rnams 'khor ba las bton nas byang chub tu sems bskyed de dga' ldan gyi gnas su skye bar bya ba'i phyir na bstod pa des bstod pa'o //
translated: this is the praise of the praise of the Bhagavat, because after those beings are taken out of cyclic existence, they are caused to generate the thought of enlightenment and to be born in the abode of Tushita.

original: da ni bcom ldan 'das kyis de ltar mdzad pa la ngo mtshar bskyed pa de la ngo mtshar mi che ba'i rgyu ston te /
analyzed: da ni bcom ldan 'das kyis de ltar mdzad pa la ngo mtshar bskyed pa de la ngo mtshar mi che ba'i rgyu ston te /

original: de yang lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di ni ngo mtshar mi che ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de yang lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di ni ngo mtshar mi che ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /

analyzed: de yang sems can bsod nams kyi phung po bcu 'gyur gyis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ba spu'i bu ga gcig 'grub po zhes bya ba nas /

analyzed: gtsug tor du gtogs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po bye ba 'bum gyis ni chos kyi dung 'grub bo zhes bya ba'i bar du ste /

original: de ni 'bras bu'i sgo nas so //
analyzed: de ni 'bras bu'i sgo nas so //
translated: This is from the point of view of the result.

analyzed: rgyu ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang byang chub kyi phyogs la ni bsod nams kyi tshogs zhes bya'o //
translated: The cause is the perfection of generosity and the accumulations of merit in the factors of enlightenment.

original: thabs tshad med pa ni ji lta ji ltar 'dul ba'i thabs de la rgyu 'bras gnyis kyis ston te /
analyzed: thabs tshad med pa ni ji lta ji ltar 'dul ba'i thabs de la rgyu 'bras gnyis kyis ston te /

original: rgyu chung du las 'bras bu mang du ston la /
analyzed: rgyu chung du las 'bras bu mang du ston la /
translated: The effect is shown to be great in comparison with the small cause.

original: 'bras bu'i thabs ni sems can thams cad ji ltar mos pa bzhin du ston pas na thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rdzogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'bras bu'i thabs ni sems can thams cad ji ltar mos pa bzhin du ston pas na thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rdzogs pa'o //
translated: The means of effect is the perfection of means, because it shows in accordance with the aspirations of all sentient beings.

original: gnyis su med pa'i shes rab kyi spyi dang rang gi mtshan nyid 'byed pa'i phyir na shes rab tshad med pa'o //
analyzed: gnyis su med pa'i shes rab kyi spyi dang rang gi mtshan nyid 'byed pa'i phyir na shes rab tshad med pa'o //

analyzed: spyod pa tshad med pa ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ni tshul khrims gsum ste /
translated: The immeasurability of practice is the practice of the buddhas and bodhisattvas, which is the three moralities.

analyzed: de la gnas pa ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba'i phyir byams pa dang / snying rje dang dga' ba dang / btang snyoms bzhis 'dul ba'i skye bo tshad med pa rnams snod du gyur par mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba'i phyir byams pa dang / snying rje dang dga' ba dang / btang snyoms bzhis 'dul ba'i skye bo tshad med pa rnams snod du gyur par mdzad pa'o //
translated: He is the one who, by means of the four immeasurables of love, compassion, joy, and equanimity, which arise from the perfection of meditation, makes immeasurable numbers of beings who are to be disciplined fit vessels.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis brgyan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis brgyan pa'i phyir /
translated: He is the one who, by means of the perfection of wisdom, which is the ornament of the knowledge of all things,

translated: Because he is endowed with the perfection of vows, which is equal to the fields of the Buddhas and the Bodhisattvas of the tenth stage, and which is the cause of the lower vehicles.
